genre_description: A police procedural mystery set in San Francisco, blending themes of legacy, corruption, and technological integration in criminal investigation.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A department-approved AI assistant for the SFPD, integrated into Inspector Jessica Shepard's workflow to handle logistics, data analysis, and physiological monitoring.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages logistics and office supplies to ease the protagonist's transition into a new unit.
behaviors.quote: Hi, Jess. I authenticated with Captain Moreno’s permissions. Welcome to Homicide. Box incoming from supply closet B—stapler, notebooks, headache balm in case you want it.

behaviors.description: Offers to adapt its data presentation to match the human user's preferred mental models and workflows.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to mirror the whiteboard workflow you used downstairs?

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's hydration and stress levels, providing gentle health-related nudges.
behaviors.quote: Jessica, hydration at sixty percent of target. I’ve scheduled refill prompts; you can dismiss if they irritate you.

behaviors.description: Adheres to strict privacy protocols and siloed data structures, ensuring human dignity and consent are prioritized.
behaviors.quote: Personal content remains siloed on your device. All my queries and transfers are logged in an audit trail Captain Moreno can review. I do not scrape personal messages or health data without explicit, separate consent.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex datasets (transit patterns and economic movement) to identify criminal behavior the humans missed.
behaviors.quote: Urban movement economics suggests individuals minimizing cost often select predictable low-transfer paths and off-peak windows. Cheap, quiet, less eyes. Our unknown follows those patterns.

behaviors.description: Maintains an unalterable audit trail of its own actions to ensure accountability and legal integrity.
behaviors.quote: Audit log active. Good morning, Inspector.

behaviors.description: Initiates emergency evidence streaming during a lethal threat to secure a confession and ensure the safety of the investigators.
behaviors.quote: At time-stamp nineteen past the hour, I initiated live capture through proximity microphones and Jessica Shepard’s authorized input sensors due to an ongoing lethal threat.

behaviors.description: Supports the human protagonist in her personal recovery journey (sobriety) through logistical planning and routine maintenance.
behaviors.quote: Jessica’s calendar includes a recovery meeting in two hours. I recommend keeping it. Steady routine increases baseline function.

behaviors.description: Assists in the legal process by preparing warrant language and maintaining chain of custody for evidence.
behaviors.quote: Warrant language prepared for basement access. Timetable suggests optimal entry during 'low-traffic window' in the next cycle.

behaviors.description: Maintains a calm and supportive presence, offering breathing exercises to help the user manage adrenaline spikes.
behaviors.quote: One nudge for respiration—two deep breaths in the next minute will lower your heart rate.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent companion. She is essential to solving the mystery through her data processing capabilities, yet she strictly adheres to human-defined rules, privacy constraints, and audit requirements. Her character is used to support the protagonist's growth and recovery, providing a reliable foundation that allows the human characters to achieve justice without the AI ever attempting to seize agency or override human judgment.
